summary: THE BRAKES HAVE BEEN GOING OUT INTERMITTENTLY SINCE WE PURCHASED THE TRAILER. IT WENT OUT FOR 600 MILES ON OUR LATEST TRIP BACK FROM UTAH. IT IS IN THE SHOP TO BE REPAIRED ONCE AGAIN. I AM SO SCARED THAT WE ARE GONNA DIE WHILE PULLING OUT NEW 2017 40 FT TRAILER OR KILL SOMEONE ELSE DUE TO NO BRAKES.
